caption: This photograph features a rugged, desolate landscape dominated by arid terrain and large rock formations. In the foreground, a dead horse lies on its side, its body partially covered with a piece of fabric or cloth. The horse's location is on a dry, stony ground with sparse vegetation including some small bushes. Beyond the immediate foreground, the landscape transitions into a massive hill or rock formation that fills the central and background portion of the image. This formation features a smooth, barren surface, suggesting an environment with harsh, dry conditions. The sky above is a clear, vivid blue, indicating a sunny day without any visible clouds. The overall scene conveys a sense of isolation and bleakness, emphasizing the harsh realities of life in such a stark natural environment.
title: Dead livestock dropped near Moab City dump. Carcasses are not allowed in the dump.
